text.1:
"#FactChecking works best when it comes with empathy."
@kateomega at the Panel "Outbreak of #misinformation: endangering people's lives at #HCBerlin" - explaining why it's not just about what is true but also about how you explain to people what is fake.
text.2: "If we can get people to stop and think before reposting, we believe we would see a reduction in the spread of a lot of this false information." @kateomega from @africacheck about minimazing fake news on #hcberlin
text.3:
There's a big deadline coming up on November 3... 

That's right - it's the final day for applications to an eight-week residential fellowship in media freedom and trust in the media in the UK & Africa - running in London Sept/Oct 2021.

Who can apply?...
https://t.co/kLzxPnalAO
